2: uname -a; cat /etc/issue; ls -al /etc/cron.*; cat /etc/crontab; ps -aux | grep root; cat /etc/services
4: cat /etc/profile ; cat /etc/bashrc ; cat ~/.bash_profile ; cat ~/.bashrc ; cat ~/.bash_logout ; env ; set
6: ls -alh /usr/bin/ ; ls -alh /sbin/ ; dpkg -l ; rpm -qa ; ls -alh /var/cache/apt/archives0 ; ls -alh /var/cache/yum/
